TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but I also use them for harvesting souls.

I wish I could reap the next person's soul.

Granted. As for I don't have a soul, you can't

I wish I had a soul

Granted. However, the person giving you the soul misheard you and gave you the sole of a shoe.

I wish I granted this wish

Granted, but it's really just a poor impersonation.

I wish people were more creative.

Granted, but, they are only creative in finding ways to be unkind to their fellow humans.

I wish I was a dinosaur.

Granted. You're one of those little midget raptor things and get hit by a car.

I wish that the Reliant Robin Shuttle had separated.

Granted, the Stig lands it on and totally obliterates your house, then sues you for obstructing traffic.

I wish I could make better wish perversions.

Granted, but the only perversions you can make are to your own wishes.

I wish this wish was Hallowed.

Granted. I didn't hear you properly, so your wish is hollow instead.

I wish for a Felipe.

Granted, but all you get is his ponytail.

I wish for light.

It goes out in ten seeconds.

I wish for a wish.

Granted. As you are an AI, you killed yourself with a paradox.

I wish 0.23 had implemented Krag's Planet Factory into the stock game.

Granted. Everyone hates it and stops playing.

I wish I wasn't so BORED.

You get chased through a bustling metropolis by an army of Slendermen. Sure, it isn't boring, but you never recover from the sheer terror and befuddlement.

I wish for pasta.

Granted. You get Kargulian pasta and it eats you.

I wish I had a sentry turret in my bedroom so that it could guard me.

Granted, It goes haywire and attacks you instead.

I wish for a NASCAR race car.

Granted, you don't have fuel for it

I wish for self esteem.

You are now steam-powered, because the genie misheard you. Thus if you don't keep a constant supply of coal burning under your belly, you'll die.

I wish I could type better.

Granted. You always hit the right keys, but it takes you fifteen years to type each word.

I wish for SPACEbar.

Granted. You get your spacebar, but it doesn't fit your keyboard (btw I know you meant "space"bar)

I wish I didn't have to make up snow days in school.

Granted, but you have to make up summer vacation days by getting arid of all other vacations.

I wish for anime.

You get Yu-Gi-Oh GX. A lifetime supply of Yu-Gi-Oh GX. Before long your face is all screwed up like the people from "The Ring" and you're lying sprawled on the kitchen floor in some stranger's house babbling incoherently about card games on motorbikes.

I wish I could sleep in as long as I wanted.

Granted, coma.

I wish I had a TARDIS.

Granted, But daleks kill you

I wish to have the Full version.

Granted. You have the full version of Flappy Bird, a free app.

I wish I didn't ever play Flappy Bird.
